title: How to Make Scrambled Pancakes

steps.headline: Make up the batter for a standard helping of pancakes.
steps.description: The directions are either on the side or back of the box.

steps.headline: Add syrup to the batter before you start cooking them.
steps.description: Between 1/4 cup and 1/2 cup should be plenty.

steps.headline: Now pour as much of the batter on the frying pan as will safely fit.
steps.description: You don't want a mess. Remember, you're not making pancakes so you don't have to pour circles of batter. Just dump it all on.

steps.headline: Now break out the spatula and push it around.
steps.description: You want to trick your mind into thinking you're scrambling an egg. It's the same idea. Cook it until the batter is cooked thoroughly.

text: Make up the batter for a standard helping of pancakes. The directions are either on the side or back of the box. Add syrup to the batter before you start cooking them. Between 1/4 cup and 1/2 cup should be plenty. Now pour as much of the batter on the frying pan as will safely fit. You don't want a mess. Remember, you're not making pancakes so you don't have to pour circles of batter. Just dump it all on. Now break out the spatula and push it around. You want to trick your mind into thinking you're scrambling an egg. It's the same idea. Cook it until the batter is cooked thoroughly. Finished.
